General.Name: Minetech Resources Bhd
General.Description: Minetech Resources Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in aggregate mining business in Malaysia. The company operates through Quarry Products, Civil Engineering, Bituminous Products, Food and Beverages, Others segments. It offers quarry services; and markets and sells quarry products. The company also provides civil and property construction services comprising infrastructure and building construction works; underground excavation and controlled blasting works; rock blasting and excavation works; double tracking works; and gold mining. In addition, it produces and sells bituminous products, including blown/oxidized bitumen, bitumen based coating enamels, bituminous and synthetic primers, coldmix, and emulsion bitumen; and trades in and distributes food and beverages. Further, the company is involved in the provision of managerial services; rental of machinery; trade of industrial machinery spare parts; property investment and development; information technology and software development; and solar farm operator businesses. Minetech Resources Berhad was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
